Package web.ser

Class Summary
CookieExample Example servlet showing request headers
HolaWWW  
LongLivedCookie Cookie that persists 1 year.
RequestHeaderExample Example servlet showing request headers
RequestInfoExample Example servlet showing request information.
RequestParamExample Example servlet showing request headers
ServletUtilities Some simple time savers.
SessionExample Example servlet showing request headers
SetCookies Sets six cookies: three that apply only to the current session (regardless of how long that session lasts) and three that persist for an hour (regardless of whether the browser is restarted).
ShowCookies Creates a table of the cookies associated with the current page.
ShowRequestHeaders Shows all the request headers sent on this particular request.
VerCabecera
